articles.title: Europe's 1360-kg satellite is set to crash on Earth - India Today
articles.description: Aeolus is losing its fuel and its tanks are almost depleted as the spacecraft orbits Earth at an altitude of 320 kilometers.
articles.content: By India Today Science Desk: Over five years after it was launched into space a 1360-kilogram satellite is on its way to crash on the planet. The spacecraft will have a fiery death as it re-enters Ea… [+2548 chars]
